headline: Is Affirm (AFRM) Using Lowe’s Partnership To Deepen Moat Or Merely Chase Volume?
summary: In February 2026, Lowe’s announced a partnership with Affirm to offer transparent payment plans, including 0% APR options for eligible shoppers, across its website and mobile app, while also featuring Lowe’s prominently in the Affirm marketplace. This deal deepens Affirm’s presence in large-ticket home improvement spending, potentially increasing transaction volumes by connecting its financing tools to Lowe’s broad customer base.
